taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a class with an association in your domain model file.

step.cmd: In the Project Explorer view pane, double-click the domain model file that you want to work with.
step.stepresult: The file and its elements are displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd: In the Editor area, right-click an association and select New Reverse Association .
step.info: The two ends of the association must be within the same Design Studio project for the reverse association to be correctly generated.

step.cmd: Double-click the newly created reverse association.
Go to the Properties view pane located below the Editor area and complete the fields to edit the reverse association's properties.
